Package com.epam.dataaccess.dao.mariadb.impl

Class TariffDAOMariaDB

java.lang.Object
com.epam.dataaccess.dao.mariadb.impl.TariffDAOMariaDB
All Implemented Interfaces:
DAO<Tariff>, TariffDAO
public class TariffDAOMariaDB extends Object implements TariffDAO
Tariff DAO implementation for MariaDB. Has methods needed by services to access persistence layer.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Hrebenozhko Ruslan

      offset - number of records to skip.

      fieldName - name of field to sort by which.
